```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library("rnaturalearth")
library("rnaturalearthdata")

world <- ne_countries(scale='medium',returnclass = 'sf')
class(world)

ggplot(data = world) +
    geom_sf() +
    coord_sf(xlim = c(48, 29.12), ylim = c(-11, 14))

```
